title: 2B B-BOY BADBOY
description: College student Tora spends his days slacking off, until he finds old-fashioned yankee Ryuu under a bridge. Ryuu has been wasted by a bunch of bad guys, so Tora brings him home to patch him up. There he discovers that Ryuu was raped by those guys. Tora can't help but worry about Ryuu... Even though he doesn't have his own life together. Love grows from an act of kindness with no strings attached!
